library(tidyverse)

```{r}
x <- read_rds("enrollment.rds")

x %>% 
  arrange(desc(u_grad)) %>% 
  head(10)
```


```{r}
x %>% 
  filter(course_department=="English") %>% 
  select(course_title, course_name, instructor_full_name, u_grad, total) %>% 
  arrange(desc(u_grad))
```
